column5: EASY ACCESS TO AA CENTER AND DALLAS CONVENTION CENTER BY RAIL! Two block walk to downtown Plano rail station. This amazing townhome offers high end furnishings, lots of space and all the amenities of home! Sleeps 10 comfortably, 2 queens, 1 king and four singles. Enjoy wood floors, stainless appliances and granite counter tops. Walk to trendy downtown Plano with restaurants, pubs and coffee houses. It's the best location in the Dallas area, near George Bush Turnpike and Central Expy!
